name: Squirrel Game (Rekemer)
description:
Squirrel needs to get to the tree with the nut. Squirrel, however, can only keep it in body. This transformation makes squirrel bigger and less agile  in jumping. What is more sometimes only way to get to the tree is to lose yummy nut for a while. Help poor thing to survive!  

Keyboard and mouse are required for game

Rules are availiable in pause menu, in tab " Rules"
